Text:
This new Magnet thing is worthless. How the hell do I do to just download 1 episode?
I just need E07.
Now it downloads the whole lot!! :(

First add this link on your torrent client, wait for few minutes till it shows the file list. Go to the file list tab. Skip the files that you dont want to dload. Thats it :)

Its not the problem with TPB, it is how the makers of bittorrent made it.
yeah magnet isn't ideal, but i believe it's to protect the site from being shut down like so many other sites.
